Package com.tools.socketproxy

A fairly simple socket server that acts as an intermediary between one or many clients and a server.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SocketListener
    Listener that will receive the communication detected.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Conversation
    Indicates an entire conversation between the client and the server.
    EmptySocketListener
    For debugging purposes.
    Main
    The main class, actually more for debugging than anything else.
    Message
    A message from client to server or vice versa.
    SimpleSocketListener
    Just dumps the entire conversation to the System.out.
    SocketProxyServer
    A fairly simple socket server.
    TalkingProxyThread
    The client is talking to us, and we're sending it onto the server.
    TalkingServerThread
    The server is talking to us, and we're sending it onto the client.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TransportEnum
    What kind of message is it?

Package com.tools.socketproxy Description

A fairly simple socket server that acts as an intermediary between one or many clients and a server.
Author:
maartenl
